description: ## Overview [pyload-ng](https://pypi.org/project/pyload-ng) is a The free and open-source Download Manager written in pure Python Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF) due to the API accepting GET requests without proper validation. An attacker can perform unauthorized actions on behalf of a legitimate user due to the session cookie not being set to `SameSite: strict`. ## Remediation Upgrade `pyload-ng` to version 0.5.0b3.dev78 or higher. ## References - [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/pyload/pyload/commit/1374c824271cb7e927740664d06d2e577624ca3e) - [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/pyload/pyload/commit/c7cdc18ad9134a75222974b39e8b427c4af845fc)
remediation: Upgrade pyload-ng to version 0.5.0b3.dev78 or higher.
title: Cross-site Request Forgery (CSRF)
